jobDescription: AVER is looking for a motivated and proactive Junior Data Analyst to join our team. Our organization is rapidly growing, with lots of room for career growth and professional development. This role will be responsible for providing data management, cleansing, and migration support for a financial system modernization effort. Qualified individuals will have prior experience supporting large (agency-wide) financial system data migrations. Responsibilities:Review, recommend modifications, and maintain an up-to-date Data Migration Strategy and Data Migration Test Plan documents.Perform data extraction, validation, and transformation tasks and coordinate with the appropriate authorities on required changes to the environment to execute the data migration strategy.Support performing full mock/test conversions and document data cleansing requirements, lessons learned, and related action items.Facilitate quick resolutions of data issues to support data migration efforts.Maintain version control of data migration artifacts/tool (e.g. scripts, templates, validation modules) and changes closely.Review existing data extraction, transformation, and validation scripts and incorporate recommended changes for the proposed financial system.Review existing data mapping structures, provide improvement recommendations, and implement updates to existing structures (or create new structures where required).Develop presentations, meeting agendas, and meeting minutes for data migration related meetings.Minimum Qualifications:At least 2+ years of PL/SQL within the Oracle Application framework.Ability to obtain, and maintain, a Government Public Trust clearance.About AVER LLC: AVER is a verified Service Disabled Veteran Owned Small Business (SDVOSB) Technology and Management Consulting firm specializing in supporting Federal, State, and local government customers. We provide to all our clients the best customer experience by employing people that have a passion for consulting and who deliver real business value every day. We pride ourselves on anticipating our client's needs and delivering solutions with diligent execution. Our multi-disciplined staff are capable of doing more than just the primary duties, allowing our clients to spend less and avoiding inefficient single-track teams.
